item.title: Dress Up Your Mac Charger
item.description: Once everyone at the office has the same mac machine, and some of them shares with you the extension cable, differentiate your mac charger with a swanky sticker from The Grommet.

item.title: Combine Multiple Internet Connection

item.title: On Switching From Mac to RaspberryPi
item.description: A photo-journalist based in West Yorkshire Peter Garner recently replaced his Mac mini with a Raspberry Pi, and he’s got some interesting insights into the process.

item.title: How to Install iOS 13 Beta Profile
item.description:
iOS releases a major free update annually in June, that being said it wont be available for public access up till September.

But what if you can’t wait to shake the new killer features out?
